abstract: Army veteran Omar J Gonzalez, who made his way into White House while carrying knife, pleads guilty in connection with the case.
lead_paragraph: An Army veteran who scaled a White House fence and dashed into the executive mansion with a knife before being caught pleaded guilty Friday in the case.

headline.print_headline: National Briefing | Washington; White House Intruder Pleads Guilty

snippet: An Army veteran who scaled a White House fence and dashed into the executive mansion with a knife before being caught pleaded guilty Friday in the case.
